name: Juvenile Kraken
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Amphibious: The kraken can breathe air and water.
traits.Freedom of Movement: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

options.Tentacle Attack (Costs 2 Actions): The kraken makes one tentacle attack.
options.Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions): While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 18+1d10 + 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.
